name: Covered Welcome Beaker (Willkommglas)

description: Covered Welcome Beaker (Willkommglas); Unknown maker, Façon de Venise, possibly the Glashütte of Sebastian Höchstetter (Austrian, active 1540 - 1569); Hall, Austria; 1550 - 1554; Free-blown colorless (slightly gray) glass with diamond point engraving, gilding, and enamel decoration; 37 cm (14 9/16 in.); 84.DK.515; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
